overview: In this DVD magazine, the Hello! Project members play a game called "Petite Daiki", where the members have a one-on-one battle with Sawayaka Goro of Joujou Gundan as an opponent. The members' unusual answers cause a lot of laughter, and many members develop unexpected talents. Joujou Gundan's Suzuki Keita acts as the moderator. Disc 1 (91mins), Disc 2 (94mins).
title: Hello! Project DVD Magazine Vol.67
